title: Foxconn invests $300 million more in Vietnam
dc:creator: Arno Maierbrugger
description:
Apple supplier Foxconn has signed a memorandum of understanding with Vietnamese developer Kinh Bac City to expand its existing manufacturing facility in the north of the country to diversify and boost production with an additional investment of $300 million, Tuoi

The post Foxconn invests $300 million more in Vietnam appeared first on Investvine.
